content: Build a recipe app that lets users save and share recipes

Let me help you design a delightful recipe app that makes cooking and sharing culinary creations a seamless experience.

Design Inspiration:
• Clean, card-based layout showcasing beautiful food photography
• Smooth transitions when browsing through recipe collections
• Instagram-style sharing functionality with modern social features
• Kitchen-friendly interface with easy-to-read typography at arm's length
• Gesture-based interactions for saving and sharing recipes

Features for the First Version:
• Home feed with trending and personalized recipe recommendations
• Recipe detail view with ingredients, steps, and cooking timer
• Personal recipe collection with categorization and search
• Social sharing capabilities with photo upload and description
• User profiles with favorite recipes and cooking achievements

Design Elements:
Colors:
• Primary: Warm white (#FAFAFA) for clean, fresh backgrounds
• Accent: Appetizing orange (#FF6B35) for calls-to-action
• Text: Deep charcoal (#2D3436) for readable content
• Supporting: Soft grays for categories and secondary information

Typography:
• Headings: SF Pro Display (iOS) / Roboto (Android) - Bold
• Body text: SF Pro Text / Roboto - Regular
• Recipe measurements: Mono-spaced font for clear reading
• Consistent 16px base font size with 1.5 line height

The app will feature subtle shadows (4px blur, 2% opacity) for depth, smooth animations (0.3s ease), and rounded corners (12px radius) for a modern feel. The layout will prioritize whitespace to prevent cognitive overload while cooking.

Let's create an elegant and functional recipe app that brings joy to cooking enthusiasts!
